thread.title: Constellation Brands Creates Investment Arm, Invests in Crafthouse Cocktails
thread.title_full: Constellation Brands Creates Investment Arm, Invests in Crafthouse Cocktails - WSJ

author: Tripp Mickle
title: Constellation Brands Creates Investment Arm, Invests in Crafthouse Cocktails
text:
Constellation Brands Inc. is creating an internal business group called Constellation Ventures to invest in new liquor, beer and wine companies and technologies and said it is taking its first stake in a ready-to-drink startup called Crafthouse Cocktails, that offers bottles of pre-mixed drinks like Moscow Mule and Southside.
Terms of the Crafthouse deal werenâ€™t disclosed, but Victor, N.Y.-based Constellation said it was buying less... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
